Articles.Content: I've been playing since .16, obsessively. I've been on the internet since the mid '90s. But I don't remember ever posting on a forum, in all this time. It may have happened, but I certainly don't know what I'm doing . Seems easy enough though. Anyway, KSP is far and away my favorite game, and I figured I should get on the forums to do challenges if I ever document them, and to say hi because I have read them every day for two years. So hello!
Hello to you . First forum post ever?!? A nice choice of first forum if I do say so too.
Hello and welcome to the KSP forums!
